message: Let's start fair. I'll take the bigger share, but you still get a decent amount.  Accept this, and we can both walk away with something.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering a larger share, but it's still a win-win.  Don't let greed ruin our chances.
Let's compromise. I'll lower my share a bit, but it's still a good deal. We're losing money every round.  Time to be pragmatic.
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer.  It's a fair split, and any more delays will just hurt us both.
